ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisRe-appointment of CHRISTINE TOVEE of Toronto, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of four years.
